name: Pizza Tartufata
description: White pizza with truffle cream, mozzarella, porcini mushrooms, and fresh shaved truffles.

name: Pizza Prosciutto e Rucola
description: Tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, Parma ham, and a bed of fresh arugula.

name: Pizza Quattro Formaggi
description: A blend of four cheeses: Gorgonzola, Mozzarella, Fontina, and Parmigiano-Reggiano.

name: Pizza Funghi Porcini
description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, and wild porcini mushrooms, topped with a drizzle of truffle oil.

name: Pizza Salsiccia e Radicchio
description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, Italian sausage, and grilled radicchio, finished with a touch of balsamic glaze.

name: Pizza Bresaola e Grana
description: White pizza with mozzarella, thinly sliced Bresaola, arugula, and shaved Grana Padano cheese.

name: Pizza al Gorgonzola e Pere
description: White pizza with mozzarella, Gorgonzola cheese, and caramelized pears, topped with walnuts.

name: Pizza alla Piemontese
description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, speck (smoked prosciutto), and caramelized onions, finished with fresh thyme.

name: Pizza Polenta e Taleggio
description: A unique pizza with a polenta crust, topped with Taleggio cheese, sautéed mushrooms, and fresh rosemary.
